episodes.shortSummary: Mark sets himself the task of sleeping with Toni from next door
episodes.summary: Despite being bullied on the street by the local children, Mark sets himself the task of sleeping with Toni from next door, basing his seduction technique on the Battle of Stalingrad...
episodes.title: Series 1 Episode 1

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy reluctantly agrees to go for a job working in Mark's office
episodes.summary: Jeremy and Super Hans' band, the Hair Blair Bunch, is going nowhere - so Jeremy reluctantly agrees to go for a job working in Mark's office...
episodes.title: Series 1 Episode 2

episodes.shortSummary: Mark finds himself smoking pot in the Lazerbowl toilets with a teenage goth...
episodes.summary: Mark and Jeremy go on the pull and Mark finds himself smoking pot in the Lazerbowl toilets with a teenage goth...
episodes.title: Series 1 Episode 3

episodes.shortSummary: Mark makes a friend at a conference, but will it turn into more than just friendship?
episodes.summary: Mark makes a friend at a business conference - but will it turn into more than just friendship? And Jeremy is forced to consider Super Hans as a replacement flatmate.
episodes.title: Series 1 Episode 4

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy tries to wow Toni with his cool new job in a music studio
episodes.summary: Jeremy tries to wow Toni with his new job in a music studio, while Mark gets passed over for promotion in favour of Sophie, and goes slowly round the twist
episodes.title: Series 1 Episode 5

episodes.shortSummary: Death and terminal illness prove to be the keys to romantic success for Mark and Jeremy...
episodes.summary: Death and terminal illness prove to be the keys to romantic success for Mark and Jeremy...
episodes.title: Series 1 Episode 6

streaming.guidance: This episode was made in 2004 and contains a scene of blackface which some viewers may find offensive and strong language.

episodes.shortSummary: Can you love two people at the same time? Jeremy thinks you can...
episodes.summary: Can you love two people at the same time? Jeremy believes you can, and his gorgeous new American girlfriend puts his taboo bashing beliefs to the test.
episodes.title: Series 2 Episode 1

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy's old classmate, Gog, who he used to bully, invites him to work on his new movie
episodes.summary: Jeremy meets an old classmate, Gog, who he used to bully. Gog is now successful and invites Jeremy to work on his latest art house movie.
episodes.title: Series 2 Episode 2

episodes.shortSummary: Mark is desperate to stop Jeff and Sophie going on a work trip to Aberdeen together
episodes.summary: Jeff is going on a work trip with Sophie to Aberdeen, and Mark - fearful they will sleep together - becomes desperate to stop them...
episodes.title: Series 2 Episode 3

episodes.shortSummary: Mark blurs the line between enthusiastic boyfriend and stalker. Jeremy joins a new band.
episodes.summary: Mark blurs the line between enthusiastic new boyfriend and stalker. Jeremy joins a new band, but insists that he is neither a roadie nor a Bez.
episodes.title: Series 2 Episode 4

episodes.shortSummary: Mark is depressed about Sophie living with Jeff. Jeremy and Jeff are getting on well.
episodes.summary: Mark becomes depressed about Sophie living with Jeff, but Jeremy is not sure that self-mutilation is the answer. Besides, Jeremy and Jeff are getting on horribly well.
episodes.title: Series 2 Episode 5

episodes.shortSummary: Mark is determined to stop Jeremy marrying Nancy for visa reasons
episodes.summary: Jeremy and Nancy are getting married, for visa reasons. Mark, determined to save his friend, will do whatever it takes to stop them...
episodes.title: Series 2 Episode 6

episodes.shortSummary: Some muggers steal Mark's precious BlackBerry, which puts him off his stroke with Sophie
episodes.summary: Some muggers steal Mark's precious BlackBerry, which puts him off his stroke with Sophie. Meanwhile, Jeremy faces a tricky dilemma over the love of his life and a potential threesome.
episodes.title: Series 3 Episode 1

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy realises he can get rid of problem people in his life by getting them sectioned
episodes.summary: Jeremy is forced to consider getting an old friend sectioned. And he soon realises sectioning could be a good way of getting rid of other problem people...
episodes.title: Series 3 Episode 2

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy throws a magic mushroom party, where he hopes to seduce his ex, Big Suze
episodes.summary: Jeremy plans to throw a secret magic mushroom party in the flat, where he hopes to seduce his ex, Big Suze
episodes.title: Series 3 Episode 3

episodes.shortSummary: Mark's sister comes to stay and guess what? Jeremy fancies her.
episodes.summary: Mark's plans for a productive week off work go out the window when his sister comes to stay and, of course, Jeremy clearly has the hots for her
episodes.title: Series 3 Episode 4

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy goes on jury service and starts an ill-advised affair with the defendant
episodes.summary: Sophie and her new gay friend, Dom, take Mark to a gay club, where he pretends to take drugs. Meanwhile, Jeremy is on jury service, where he starts an ill-advised affair with the defendant.
episodes.title: Series 3 Episode 5

episodes.shortSummary: Mark is worried he's drifting apart from Sophie... so he must propose!
episodes.summary: Mark is worried he's drifting apart from Sophie, so immediate action is called for: he must propose... and where better than the Quantocks?
episodes.title: Series 3 Episode 6

episodes.shortSummary: Mark and Sophie are engaged to be married, but Mark's having doubts...
episodes.summary: Mark and Sophie are engaged to be married. Unfortunately Mark is having doubts; crippling doubts.
episodes.title: Series 4 Episode 1

episodes.shortSummary: At the JLB conference, Johnson tells Mark he has to give a presentation to the board
episodes.summary: At the annual JLB conference in Kettering, Johnson tells Mark he has to give a presentation in front of the entire board
episodes.title: Series 4 Episode 2

episodes.shortSummary: Mark is still having doubts about marrying Sophie, so he joins a gym to avoid her
episodes.summary: Mark is still having doubts about marrying Sophie, so he joins a gym in order to spend as much time away from her as possible
episodes.title: Series 4 Episode 3

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy gets a job as a handyman for his hero - techno musician Russell 'The Orgazoid'
episodes.summary: Jeremy meets his hero - techno musician Russell 'The Orgazoid' - and ends up working as his handyman. But Mark gets suspicious, as Jeremy's job seems only to consist of making smoothies for Russell.
episodes.title: Series 4 Episode 4

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy has organised a stag weekend: him and Mark on a canal boat
episodes.summary: Jeremy has organised a stag weekend. This consists of Mark and Jeremy on a canal boat on the Shropshire Union Canal. Unfortunately, it's cold and there's nothing to do...
episodes.title: Series 4 Episode 5

episodes.shortSummary: It's the big day: Mark is getting married to Sophie
episodes.summary: It's the big day: Mark is getting married to Sophie. Mark and his best man, Jeremy, set off in the car to the church, with a very hungover Super Hans in the back.
episodes.title: Series 4 Episode 6

episodes.shortSummary: Mark rediscovers single life, and he and Jeremy become victims of crime
episodes.summary: Mark rediscovers single life after his disastrous wedding to Sophie, and he and Jeremy become victims of crime
episodes.title: Series 5 Episode 1

episodes.shortSummary: Mark and Sophie return to work after their non-existent honeymoon
episodes.summary: Mark and Sophie return to work after their non-existent honeymoon and Mark tries to deflect the inevitable bad PR attached to a jilter. Meanwhile, Jeremy and Super Hans's band play their first gig.
episodes.title: Series 5 Episode 2

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy finally runs out of money. Mark has to find a girlfriend before his birthday party.
episodes.summary: Jeremy finally runs out of money and finds himself on a downward spiral of hunger, homelessness and criminality. Meanwhile, Mark needs to find a girlfriend before his birthday party.
episodes.title: Series 5 Episode 3

streaming.guidance: Strong language and scenes of sexual violence that viewers may find upsetting

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy's mother visits with her new boyfriend, a military man who Jeremy resents
episodes.summary: Jeremy's mother comes to visit for a family funeral. Her new boyfriend is a military man who Jeremy deeply resents, and who Mark idolises. Desperate to impress, Mark endures an extraordinary ordeal.
episodes.title: Series 5 Episode 4

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy and Super Hans play a Christian rock festival
episodes.summary: Jeremy and Super Hans get a band manager and play a Christian rock festival. Mark comes along as their roadie, and learns how to have sex properly for the first time in his life.
episodes.title: Series 5 Episode 5

episodes.shortSummary: Mark gets into online gaming and live role-play with Dobby. Is she 'the one'?
episodes.summary: Mark gets into online gaming and live role-play with Dobby and wonders whether she may really be 'the one'. Meanwhile, Jeremy is brainwashed - loosely speaking - by a cult.
episodes.title: Series 5 Episode 6

episodes.shortSummary: Newly promoted Mark decides to enjoy his power by splashing out on a boiler and a new sofa
episodes.summary: Newly promoted Mark decides to enjoy his additional power and wealth by splashing out on a boiler and a 'creamy elephant' sofa, and by finding Jeremy a job in the office
episodes.title: Series 6 Episode 1

episodes.shortSummary: Mark makes a final play for Dobby, but Sophie has some news...
episodes.summary: Jeremy meets a new love, Russian emigre Elena. Meanwhile, Mark makes a final play for Dobby, the object of his desires. But Sophie has some news...
episodes.title: Series 6 Episode 2

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy realises that he's in love with Elena, but should he tell her?
episodes.summary: Jeremy realises that he's in love with Elena and decides to be less selfish in order to win her affection. He also thinks it might be a good idea to tell her he loves her, but Mark isn't so sure.
episodes.title: Series 6 Episode 3

episodes.shortSummary: Mark discovers that Jeremy's girlfriend Elena has a guilty secret, but should he tell him?
episodes.summary: Mark discovers that Jeremy's girlfriend Elena has a guilty secret. But should he tell him when Jez is clearly so happy?
episodes.title: Series 6 Episode 4

episodes.shortSummary: As a last desperate hurrah before the baby arrives, Mark and Jeremy throw a party
episodes.summary: As a last desperate hurrah before the baby arrives, Mark and Jeremy decide to throw a party. For Mark, it's his last chance with Dobby, for Jeremy, it's an opportunity to make Elena insanely jealous.
episodes.title: Series 6 Episode 5

episodes.shortSummary: Jez plots to get rid of Elena's bride Gail and win Elena back
episodes.summary: Elena and Gail's wedding is imminent, but Jeremy is busy plotting how to get rid of Gail and win Elena back
episodes.title: Series 6 Episode 6

episodes.shortSummary: Mark and Jeremy are at the hospital awaiting the birth of Mark and Sophie's baby
episodes.summary: Mark and Jeremy are at the hospital awaiting the birth of Mark's baby. Sophie is determined to have a natural birth and doesn't want Mark to transfer any of his anxiety to the baby.
episodes.title: Series 7 Episode 1

episodes.shortSummary: Dobby is going out with a graphic designer. Can Mark win her back? Or will Gerrard?
episodes.summary: Dobby, the object of Mark's desires, is going out with Simon, a graphic designer. Mark and Gerrard form the 'Dobby Club', devoted to winning her over. But who will ultimately triumph, Mark or Gerrard?
episodes.title: Series 7 Episode 2

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy tries to impress Zahra by holding a book group. Mark worries about sex.
episodes.summary: Jeremy tries to impress Zahra by holding a book group at the flat, but he's only ever read Mr Nice. Meanwhile, Mark is worried that he can't satisfy Dobby's sexual needs.
episodes.title: Series 7 Episode 3

episodes.shortSummary: It's the day of the christening but Mark and Jeremy get locked in the hallway
episodes.summary: It's christening day for his baby, and Mark arranges to pick up Jeremy, the baby's godfather, from Zahra's flat on his way to the church. Unfortunately, the lads get locked in the hallway.
episodes.title: Series 7 Episode 4

episodes.shortSummary: Mark invites his parents over for Christmas lunch, but Dobby and Super Hans turn up too
episodes.summary: It's Christmas Day and Mark has invited his parents over for lunch. He's planned everything, but Jeremy is over-excited, and Dobby and Super Hans show up.
episodes.title: Series 7 Episode 5

episodes.shortSummary: It's New Year's Eve and Mark is depressed about Dobby, but Jeremy's having none of it...
episodes.summary: It's New Year's Eve, and Mark is depressed about Dobby, but Jeremy is determined that the El Dude Brothers are going to enjoy the night of their lives
episodes.title: Series 7 Episode 6

episodes.shortSummary: Mark has asked Dobby to move in with him, but Jeremy is dragging his heels over moving out
episodes.summary: Mark has asked Dobby to move in with him, and Jeremy is faced with the prospect of moving out. But Jeremy is dragging his heels and Mark is worried that Dobby will move in with Gerrard instead.
episodes.title: Series 8 Episode 1

episodes.shortSummary: Mark's book is accepted by a 'publisher'. Jeremy enrols on a life coaching course.
episodes.summary: Mark gets a lucky break when his book, Business Secrets of the Pharaohs, is accepted by a 'publisher'. Jeremy, in an attempt to kick-start his career, enrols on a life-coaching course.
episodes.title: Series 8 Episode 2

streaming.guidance: Very strong language and adult humour

episodes.shortSummary: Dobby's ex invites Mark, Dobby, Jeremy and Super Hans on a paintballing weekend
episodes.summary: Simon, Dobby's ex-boyfriend, invites Mark, Dobby, Jeremy and Super Hans to join him and his friends for a paintballing weekend
episodes.title: Series 8 Episode 3

episodes.shortSummary: Mark employs a decorator to paint the kitchen. Jeremy gives him free life-coaching advice.
episodes.summary: Mark employs a decorator to paint the kitchen, and Jeremy helps out by giving him free life-coaching advice
episodes.title: Series 8 Episode 4

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy moves in with Mark's sister and her five-year-old son
episodes.summary: Jeremy, desperate to find somewhere else to live, rekindles his old relationship with Mark's sister Sara, and moves in with her and her five-year-old son, Joshy
episodes.title: Series 8 Episode 5

streaming.guidance: Very strong language and adult humour

episodes.shortSummary: Dobby is offered a job in New York. Mark thinks she's lying.
episodes.summary: Dobby is offered a job in New York. While she's still on the horns of a dilemma, Mark - who thinks she's lying - suggests they spend a weekend in the country...
episodes.title: Series 8 Episode 6

episodes.shortSummary: When Jeremy has to ask for a loan, Mark sees his chance for revenge...
episodes.summary: Time has not healed the rift between former friends Mark and Jeremy. When Jeremy has to ask for a loan, Mark sees his chance for revenge...
episodes.title: Series 9 Episode 1

streaming.guidance: Very strong language and adult humour

episodes.shortSummary: Super Hans prepares for his wedding day and Mark is under pressure as his best man
episodes.summary: Mark and Jeremy are reunited in the flat, Super Hans prepares for his wedding day, putting Mark under pressure as his best man. But there's a perk - Dobby will be there.
episodes.title: Series 9 Episode 2

episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy's love life takes a surprising turn as Mark deals with his own matters of the heart
episodes.summary: Jeremy's love life takes a surprising turn. Mark deals with his own matters of the heart.
episodes.title: Series 9 Episode 3

episodes.shortSummary: Mark's determined to get the woman of his dreams despite the fact that she has a husband
episodes.summary: Mark's determination to get the woman of his dreams isn't hindered by the fact that she has a husband
episodes.title: Series 9 Episode 4

episodes.shortSummary: Mark has a play date with his son in a soft-play centre. But things don't go to plan.
episodes.summary: Jeremy and Super Hans come to blows over the rights to a tune they wrote back in the noughties, while Mark's play date with his son doesn't quite go to plan
episodes.title: Series 9 Episode 5

episodes.originalTitle: Are We Going to Be Alright?
episodes.secondaryTitle: Are We Going to Be Alright?
episodes.shortSummary: Jeremy is turning 40, and Mark tries to win the woman of his dreams
episodes.summary: It's the last ever Peep Show from the El Dude Brothers. Jeremy is turning 40 - and it's hitting him hard - while Mark makes an audacious attempt to win the woman of his dreams.
episodes.title: Series 9 Episode 6

series.summary: Despite being bullied on the street by the local children, Mark sets himself the task of sleeping with the divorcee Toni next door, basing his seduction technique on the Battle of Stalingrad...
series.title: Series 1

series.summary: Mark and his unrequited love Sophie are getting on well, especially since he started hacking into her emails. Meanwhile, Jez hooks up with Nancy, whos on a mission to break every taboo in the book!
series.title: Series 2

series.summary: Jez's marriage to Nancy hits the skids as soon as Big Suze returns. Meanwhile, despite problems at work, Mark takes his relationship with Sophie to the next level with a Sunday Times MegaDeal...
series.title: Series 3

series.summary: Lingering doubt? Check. Butt-clenching fear? Check. Bottom moist? Check-arooni! Can Mark's crippling sense of doubt over his impending nuptials be soothed by Jeremy sleeping with Sophie's mother?
series.title: Series 4

series.summary: With two broken marriages between them, Jez and Mark embark on an odyssey of womanising and hedonism, and no amount of chlamydia or unpleasant sex is going to stop Mark from finding 'The One'...
series.title: Series 5

series.summary: With Sophie's baby on the way, Mark and Jeremy become even more desperate to enjoy their final days of freedom. Newly promoted Mark decides to pursue Dobby, but a fire drill dampens his passions...
series.title: Series 6

series.summary: Series seven introduces Mark's parents, as the boys attempt to celebrate a traditional family Christmas, and, after a disastrous New Year, Mark and Jeremy face choices that could end their friendship
series.title: Series 7

series.summary: Life is looking up for Mark, who has asked Dobby to move in with him, but first Jeremy has to move out...
series.title: Series 8

series.summary: The final series of the hit comedy and the culmination of Mark and Jeremy's misadventures
series.title: Series 9

brand.shortSummary: Award-winning sitcom starring David Mitchell and Robert Webb as dysfunctional flatmates
brand.summary: Award-winning sitcom. David Mitchell and Robert Webb play two dysfunctional flatmates who reveal all their inner thoughts - whether dark, stupid or embarrassing. Or, occasionally, all three...
brand.title: Peep Show

brand.summary: Classic BAFTA award-winning comedy. Banished from the ivory towers of Reynholm Industries, the IT crowd lurk below ground, avoiding work and social contact in equal measure...

brand.shortSummary: It's Marcella's 30th. She's found a life coach who's prepared to help sort her life out.
brand.summary: It's Marcella's 30th birthday and this year she's determined to sort her life out. Luckily she's found a life coach who's prepared to help with that mammoth task.
